title: Beaker with ibex motifs Lady Dai comparison

content.prompt: Because of the context in which it was found, the beaker with ibex motifs from prehistoric Susa is believed to have functioned in a way that was most similar to which of the following works?

choices.label: The black-on-black ceramic vessel by Maria and Julian Mart√≠nez
The Sika dwa kofi (Golden Stool) of the Ashanti peoples
The funeral banner of Lady Dai (Xin Zhui)

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
